019package org.jgrapes.io.events;
020
021import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
022
023/**
024 * Indicates a problem while opening a network connection.
025 */
026public class ConnectError extends IOError {
027
028    /**
029     * Creates a new event as a copy of an existing event. Useful
030     * for forwarding an event.
031     *  
032     * @param event
033     */
034    public ConnectError(ConnectError event) {
035        super(event);
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * @param event
040     * @param message
041     */
042    public ConnectError(Event<?> event, String message) {
043        super(event, message);
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * @param event
048     * @param message
049     * @param throwable
050     */
051    public ConnectError(Event<?> event, String message, Throwable throwable) {
052        super(event, message, throwable);
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * @param event
057     * @param throwable
058     */
059    public ConnectError(Event<?> event, Throwable throwable) {
060        super(event, throwable);
061    }
062}
